description: Get granular list of steps in workflow.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

nested_items.name: WorkflowType
nested_items.description: The type of workflow. The only supported value is APPFLOW_INTEGRATION.

nested_items.name: AppflowIntegration
nested_items.description: Workflow step information specific to APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: FlowName
nested_items.description: Name of the flow created during execution of workflow step. APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow type creates an appflow flow during workflow step execution on the customers behalf.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Workflow step status for APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: ExecutionMessage
nested_items.description: Message indicating execution of workflow step for APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: RecordsProcessed
nested_items.description: Total number of records processed during execution of workflow step for APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: BatchRecordsStartTime
nested_items.description: Start datetime of records pulled in batch during execution of workflow step for APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: BatchRecordsEndTime
nested_items.description: End datetime of records pulled in batch during execution of workflow step for APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: Creation timestamp of workflow step for APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: Last updated timestamp for workflow step for APPFLOW_INTEGRATION workflow.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
